info.github_app_auth_success: GitHub App authentication successful! Server-based authentication is set up.
info.github_app_auth_why: This authentication is required for automatic PR creation. Without it, key features will not be available.
info.github_app_auth_failed_why: You must complete GitHub App authentication to use automatic PR features.
info.github_app_auth_skipped_why: If you skip GitHub App authentication, some features such as automatic PR creation will be limited.
info.oauth_why: Some features, such as PR creation, require this authentication. If you skip, some features will be limited.
info.oauth_skipped_why: If you skip OAuth authentication, some features such as PR creation will be limited.
info.oauth_failed_why: If OAuth authentication fails, you will not be able to use features such as PR creation.
info.ai_token_why: To use AI features (code review, auto description, etc.), a token is required. You can use basic features without authentication.
info.ai_token_failed_why: AI token issuance failed, so AI features (code review, auto description, etc.) will not be available.

prompts.oauth_authenticate: Would you like to authenticate with your GitHub user account for PR creation?
prompts.oauth_already_authenticated: A GitHub user token is already registered. Do you want to re-authenticate?
prompts.project_already_initialized: A project configuration already exists. Would you like to initialize (backup and create new)?
prompts.github_app_already_authenticated: GitHub App is already authenticated. Do you want to re-authenticate?

warning.ai_token_failed: Failed to acquire AI API token.
warning.ai_token_error: An error occurred while acquiring AI API token.
